about.title: About Base of Basic
about.description: Base of Basic English Course is dedicated to helping learners aged 17 and above build a strong foundation in English. Through structured modules, speaking practice, and guidance from experienced tutors, we make learning effective and enjoyable.
about.feature1_desc: Our curriculum is carefully designed with progressive modules that build upon each other, ensuring steady improvement.
about.feature2_desc: Regular conversation sessions help you gain confidence and fluency in real-world communication scenarios.
about.feature3_desc: Learn from experienced instructors who understand the challenges of English language learning.

programs.title: Our Course Programs
programs.description: Choose the program that best fits your learning style and schedule.
programs.basic_desc: Grammar, vocabulary, and everyday conversation for absolute beginners.
programs.intensive_desc: Faster-paced sessions for those who want to improve quickly in a shorter time.
programs.online_desc: Learn from anywhere with interactive Zoom classes and digital modules.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our English course.
faq.q1: Is this course suitable for complete beginners?
faq.a1: Yes, our course is designed for those starting from zero.
faq.a2: Yes, participants will receive a certificate of completion.
faq.q3: Are classes held online or offline?
faq.a3: Currently, all classes are held offline at our learning center. However, we also have an Online Class option available.
faq.a4: Yes, the course is designed to accommodate flexible schedules.
